thread.title: Everyone is making the same Radamel Falcao joke as ex-Man United striker scores stunning header vs Man City
thread.title_full: Everyone is making the same Radamel Falcao joke as ex-Man United striker scores stunning header vs Man City

author: Jake Polden
title: Everyone is making the same Radamel Falcao joke as ex-Man United striker scores stunning header vs Man City
text:
Man United's unlikely hero (Photo: Reuters) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The less said about Radamel Falcao's Manchester United career the better. 
It never really worked out for him, we all know that... but it turns out he is a Man United LEGEND anyway. 
Why? Well because he scored a stunning header against rivals Man City - at their place - in the Champions League, that's why. 
Football is a fickle sport, eh? 
As expected, Twitter erupted after the Colombian took Willy Caballero completely by surprise with his stunningly old-fashioned diving header. One for the Red Devils fans (Photo: Manchester United FC) 
Some, presumably Monaco fans, celebrated the effort. 
Some, presumably Manchester City fans, had a little moan. 
And some, DEFINITELY Manchester United fans, cracked the same joke... Apart from this Twitter user... Like us on Facebook
